name: Ui Ui
description:
Stuck in bed with two heads, a delirious fever and nowhere to go?

Why not try

Ui Ui

"A tycoon game where you party with insects in realtime"

2014 Insanity Game Jam seed

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER INTRAVAGANZA

----

QWOP meets Marshmallow Duel

----

A game to answer the age-old question: "What if you look deep inside yourself and discover only the heads of dead white guys?"

A game to make you dance

A game where you swim in the great beast's eye

A game to make you forget

A game prompted by V.S. Luoma-Aho's toptastic Kronologi - because how better to appreciate great stuff than with slipshod triviality?

----

Controls

P1:

Q, E - Lob head

A, D - Pivot

Z, C - Kick leg

P2: 

7, 9 - Lob head

U, O - Pivot

J, L - Kick leg

----

Joypad controls forthcoming

----

Music: Future Cha Cha Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

----

Gita

Twita

----

Play in your browser: http://doubledashgames.com/uiui_mini/UiUi_mini.htm...

- - - -

Grab a friend

Take a swim in Lake You

Go on

You deserve it
